title: Extended TAM based acceptance of AI-Powered ChatGPT for supporting metacognitive self-regulated learning in education: A mixed-methods study
content:
Publication date: 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Nisar Ahmed Dahri, Noraffandy Yahaya, Waleed Mugahed Al-Rahmi, Ahmed Aldraiweesh, Uthman Alturki, Sultan Almutairy, Anna Shutaleva, Rahim Bux Soomro
